item.title: Fish
item.description: Prelude I have very early memories of rock music in my life. Since I was a toddler, my parents (and particularly my dad) got me used to listen to 80s rock music. Bands like Queen, Guns N' Roses, AC/DC, Van Halen, and Bon Jovi are ingrained in my memories as sounds of my childhood. It's not surprising that my taste in music has developed from there, branching out over the years in metal and progressive rock.
